data.comment: The big names in today's match at Mercedes-Benz Stadium have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Jair Marrufo, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 2, Jair Marrufo signals a New York throw-in in Atlanta's half.
Goal kick for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
New York drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 3, New York to take a throw-in in Atlanta territory.
Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jon Gallagher (Atlanta) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Atlanta.
Can New York capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atlanta's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Atlanta goal kick.
In the minute 9, In Atlanta a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlanta's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Atlanta.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Throw-in for New York in their own half.
Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New York.
Ball safe as Atlanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Atlanta.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for New York at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New York just outside Atlanta's area.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atlanta close to the penalty box.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Atlanta in the half of New York.
Throw-in New York.
Can Atlanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
In the minute 22, Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Atlanta to check on Marcelino Moreno, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 25, Atlanta advance rapidly upfield but Jair Marrufo blows for offside.
Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marcelino Moreno has recovered and rejoins the match in Atlanta.
In the minute 26, New York to take a throw-in in Atlanta territory.
Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for New York, close to Atlanta's area.
Jair Marrufo awards Atlanta a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Jair Marrufo signals a Atlanta throw-in in New York's half.
Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
New York have a goal kick.
In the minute 29, It's a goal kick for the away team in Atlanta.
Throw-in New York.
Ball safe as Atlanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Goal kick for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
In the minute 32, At Mercedes-Benz Stadium, Atlanta are penalized for being offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for New York in their own half.
In the minute 38, Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Atlanta drive upfield and Jake Mulraney gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a New York defender.
Corner awarded to Atlanta.
In the minute 39, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Throw-in for Atlanta in the half of New York.
Atlanta are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 41, Atlanta's Jake Mulraney gets in a shot but it is blocked by a New York defender.
Throw-in for Atlanta in the half of New York.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
In the minute 44, Atlanta will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from New York.
Important block from the New York defence as Jeff Larentowicz fires in a strike for Atlanta.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Throw-in for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 47, Jair Marrufo awards Atlanta a goal kick.
In Atlanta New York drive forward through Daniel Royer. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to New York.
Goal! Caden Clark gives New York a 0-1 lead in Atlanta.
Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Atlanta in the half of New York.
New York's Sean Davis has been booked in Atlanta.
Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 55, Atlanta to take a throw-in in New York territory.
Can Atlanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, New York's Kyle Duncan breaks free at Mercedes-Benz Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Atlanta have a goal kick.
Jair Marrufo signals a New York throw-in in Atlanta's half.
In the minute 61, Atlanta make their first substitution with Adam Jahn replacing Marcelino Moreno.
Throw-in Atlanta.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New York.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Florian Valot is on a sub for Samuel Tetteh for New York.
Jake Mulraney (Atlanta) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 66, Jared Stroud is replacing Caden Clark for New York at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Throw-in for New York in their own half.
Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Atlanta close to the penalty box.
Atlanta to take a throw-in in New York territory.
Mo Adams is replacing Jurgen Damm for the home team.
In the minute 70, The home team replace Jake Mulraney with Laurence Wyke.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 76, Emerson Hyndman of Atlanta gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
The away team have replaced Sean Davis with Dru Yearwood. This is the third substitution made today by Bradley Carnell.
In the minute 77, Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jair Marrufo signals a Atlanta throw-in in New York's half.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlanta's half?
In the minute 79, Throw-in for New York in their own half.
Atlanta have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Atlanta.
In the minute 82, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Brian White is on a sub for Tom Barlow for New York.
Bradley Carnell (New York) is making a fifth substitution, with Sean Nealis replacing Marc Rzatkowski.
New York are whistled for offside.
In the minute 84, Stephen Glass is making the team's fourth substitution at Mercedes-Benz Stadium with Manuel Castro replacing Jeff Larentowicz.
New York drive into the zone and Dru Yearwood is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 85, Throw-in for New York in the half of Atlanta.
Throw-in for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Atlanta in Atlanta.
In the minute 89, Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
New York needs to be cautious. Atlanta have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Atlanta in Atlanta.
Jon Gallagher (Atlanta) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Atlanta.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Emerson Hyndman is booked for the home team.
